text: Club de Fútbol Tigres de la Universidad Autónoma de Nuevo León, commonly known as Tigres UANL, is a Mexican professional football club. Its based in San Nicolás de los Garza, a suburb of Monterrey. ==Honours== ===Domestic League=== * Liga MX: 5 ::1977-78, 1981-82, Apertura 2011, Apertura 2015, Apertura 2016 * Copa México: 3 ::1975-76, 1995-96, Clausura 2014 * Ascenso MX: 2 ::Invierno 1996, Verano 1997 * Segunda División: 1 ::1973-74 * Interliga: 2 ::2005, 2006 * Mexico's Under-20 Tournament: 1 ::2009-10 ===International=== * SuperLiga: 1 ::2009 ===Friendly Tournaments=== * Rio Grande Plate: 2 ::2007, 2008 * Serie Mundial de Futbol: 1 ::2007 * Copa Chiapas: 1 ::2008 * Copa Cani: 1 ::2013 ==References== Category:Mexican football clubs Category:Sport in Nuevo León Category:Sport in Monterrey Category:1960 establishments Category:1960s establishments in Mexico
title: Tigres UANL
